function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cross-sectional survey results not accounting for changes during COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Findings may not accurately represent behavior during a pandemic, leading to potential misinformation","Mitigation":"Conduct longitudinal studies to capture changes over time, especially during pandemics","Technologies":"Data analysis tools to track behavior changes over time","People":"University-educated individuals in Bangladesh using social media","Owner":"Research institutions and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Survey results not representative of entire population","Impact":"Limited generalizability of findings to the broader population","Mitigation":"Expand the survey to include a more diverse demographic and geographic representation","Technologies":"Demographic analysis tools for survey sampling","People":"Bangladeshi and world population","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for political and societal factors in misinformation research","Impact":"Failure to account for broader influences on misinformation sharing and cyberchondria","Mitigation":"Incorporate political and societal factors into research framework and analysis","Technologies":"Social network analysis tools, sentiment analysis algorithms","People":"Research institutions, governments, platform developers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, tech companies"}]}
